name: Customer Support Ticket to Code Fix

parameters.prompt:
='Customer Support Ticket:

Title: ' + $json.body.title + '

Description: ' + $json.body.description + '

Steps to Reproduce: ' + $json.body.steps_to_reproduce + '

Expected Behavior: ' + $json.body.expected + '

Actual Behavior: ' + $json.body.actual + '

' + 'Customer Email: ' + $json.body.customer_email + '

Please:
1. Analyze this issue and identify the root cause
2. Search the codebase for related code
3. Generate a fix for the problem
4. Create test cases to verify the fix
5. Provide a workaround the customer can use immediately'

additionalOptions.systemPrompt: You are a senior developer handling customer support issues. Focus on finding quick, reliable fixes while maintaining code quality. Always provide workarounds when possible.

parameters.prompt: Run all tests related to the fix we just implemented. Make sure nothing is broken. If test passed then return 'PASSED' else return 'FAILED'

parameters.title: =fix: Customer issue - {{ $node['Support Ticket Webhook'].json.body.title }}
parameters.head: =fix/ticket-{{ $node['Support Ticket Webhook'].json.body.ticket_id }}

parameters.subject: =Re: {{ $node['Support Ticket Webhook'].json.body.title }} - Fix in Progress
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $node['Support Ticket Webhook'].json.body.customer_name }},

Thank you for reporting this issue. We've identified the problem and have already developed a fix that's currently being reviewed.

**Immediate Workaround:**
{{ $node['Analyze & Fix Issue'].json.summary.workaround }}

**Permanent Fix:**
We expect the fix to be deployed within the next 2-4 hours. You'll receive another email once it's live.

**Technical Details:**
{{ $node['Analyze & Fix Issue'].json.summary.explanation }}

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Your Support Team

---
*Ticket Reference: {{ $node['Support Ticket Webhook'].json.body.ticket_id }}*
